Which one is 37007 worst and best deal o:
SELECT * FROM (
    SELECT TOP 1 scp.MandateId, scp.MarketValue, dpu.DealId, di.DealName, 'Best' AS DealStatus
    FROM ShareClassPerformance scp
    JOIN DealPriceUpdate dpu ON dpu.ISIN = scp.ISIN
    JOIN DealInformation di ON di.DealId = dpu.DealId
    WHERE scp.MandateId = 37007 AND scp.Year = 2024 AND scp.Quarter = (
        SELECT MAX(Quarter)
        FROM ShareClassPerformance
        WHERE MandateId = 37007 AND Year = 2024
    )
    ORDER BY scp.MarketValue DESC
) a
UNION
SELECT * FROM (
    SELECT TOP 1 scp.MandateId, scp.MarketValue, dpu.DealId, di.DealName, 'Worst' AS DealStatus
    FROM ShareClassPerformance scp
    JOIN DealPriceUpdate dpu ON dpu.ISIN = scp.ISIN
    JOIN DealInformation di ON di.DealId = dpu.DealId
    WHERE scp.MandateId = 37007 AND scp.Year = 2024 AND scp.Quarter = (
        SELECT MAX(Quarter)
        FROM ShareClassPerformance
        WHERE MandateId = 37007 AND Year = 2024
    )
    ORDER BY scp.MarketValue ASC
) b

    a.AUM AS AUM_2023,

    b.Quarter AS Quarter_2024, 
    b.AUM AS AUM_2024,

        Year = 2024 AND
